author: Simon Difford
description: Orange and lemon zestiness enlivened with champagne.
name: Grand 75
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
60 ml Brut champagne or sparkling wine

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE first 2 ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
TOP with champagne and briefly stir
